name: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 - Siberian Strike
description:
Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 - Siberian Strike is an action game developed by City Interactive. It was originally released in 2013. City Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 - Siberian Strike is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
